mdRecord.dcterms:title: Russian realities & problems / by Paul Milyoukov, Peter Struve, A. Lappo-Danilevsky, Roman Dmowski, and Harold Williams; ed. by J. D. Duff

mdRecord.dcterms:description: The war and Balkan politics [by] P. N. Milyoukov.--The representative system in Russia [by] P. N. Milyoukov.--Past and present of Russian economics [by] P. Struve.--Poland, old and new [by] R. Dmowski.--The nationalities of Russia [by] H. Williams.--The development of science and learning in Russia [by] A. S. Lappo-Danilevsky.
Lectures delivered at Cambridge in August 1916.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Eastern question (Balkan)
Polish question
